verses.text: \w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* entered \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*. \w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron.

\w Then|strong="H5307"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w went|strong="H4872"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Meeting|strong="H4150"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w climbed|strong="H5927"\w* \w Mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*.
